comment: I took him for algorithm analysis and he was ok, I guess. He was very, very confusing throughout the course and often, it seemed like he didn't know how to explain things and couldn't offer any examples. He made up for all of this by making the midterm and final half take-home. So, if he messes up, he'll make up for it all later. Got a B in the end

Gave 11 assignments but only graded 2 of them throughout the class. It felt like he didn't prepare for lectures. Also, we had no idea what our grades were going into the final (and he didn't either, I don't think).

Class was supposed to be given by Harbort, but he was a last minute replacement. You can tell that he was scrambling to put together lectures at the last minute. Was not very good at first, but was open to criticism and improved based on it. Not a very clear grading criteria. Takes a lot of time to discuss a single topic in lecture.

Whenever he does a lecture it takes forever to get through each problem as he often forgets what he is doing or how to solve a problem and relies on the students to help him out. Often times I have gone to him for assistance and each time he tell us to "check Google". And if it isn't on Google? Well hopefully you just figure it out before the test.

Erg... most troublesome prof for me this semester. Knows what he's talking about, but is not great at explaining it. Also (and this might have only been this semester, judging by other reviews), he was VERY disorganized and did not keep to schedule. I took a night class, so he might be earlier in the day, but I can't recommend him.
He knows his stuff. TRUST me, he does.

He is a good instructor and knows what he is talking about. If you like database you will probably like him. I don't like how insanely unorganized he was it took him the whole semester to get any of our grades back at all. It makes it difficult to focuse like that. He does let you use cheat sheets so that definately helps.
Dr. Guimaraes is passionate about database & really wants you to learn the concepts. Study old tests and you'll be fine, exams are basically word for word wit very little tweaks.

Dr. Guimaraes has a great knowledge of the subject matter and it shows.  His tests are very reasonable if you pay attention in class and review your notes and powerpoints.  The final comes straight from the tests you take throughout the semester.  Coffee is your best friend in this class!!!
Enjoyed Class, Coffee site very helpful. If you must take Database he is the best.
Good instructor. Study old tests and coffee site. The final was straight from the previous test we had taken during the semester.

If you want to lear about database, you got the right teacher! Tendency to go fast but if you let him know he slow down and take time to explain...take notes on explanations, specially if he explained something twice...Hint: it will be in the quiz :-) Half of test come from the practice tests.
Test are fair with the exception of the final.  Practice converting table to ER and vice-verse. Practice with the coffe website, its better than the book. Book sucks! Hope they change it soon.
Knows the subject very well! some times is hard to keep up with him but if you let him know he will slow down. If you don't undestand something ask him, he takes the time to explain. Good class!
Extremely intelligent prof. Some students found him difficult because of accent, but I found him to be very helpful.
got a c in the class.  Very smart but not good at coming down to the level of entry level database.
